Experience

As an E-commerce assistant, I have been responsible for handling customer inquiries and complaints. I have also been responsible for handling social media and Trustpilot.

Garder

April 2021 - November 2021

As part of the Danish Royal Guards, I have completed the Army basic training (Hærens Basisuddannelse) and have been part of the guard at Amalienborg Palace. I have also been responsible for guarding the palace and the royal family.

June 2016 - December 2021

As a Sales Assistant in Føtex, I was primarily responsible for handling customers in the kiosk/customer service and having an overview of the checkout line cashiers. I was also responsible for handling customer inquiries and complaints. Furthermore, I was both responsible for opening and closing the store.

Responsible for hiring the new student tutors and overseeing the planning of introdays for the new students. Also responsible for making sure the tutors get the required education to be able to tutor the new students.
